Supplementary table 1: contains hazard ratios for all outcomes of interest for main, COVID phenotype and prior COVID history analysis.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(readr)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = gsub("/analysis","",getwd()))
```

## Supplementary Table 1

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
df=read_csv("output/supplementary_table_1.csv")
df %>%
    datatable(extensions = 'Buttons',
              options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                             buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print' ),
                             lengthMenu = list(c(50,-1),
                                               c(50,"All"))))
```
